column1: Develop a python program to calculate the average score of a student over the course of a semester.
Generate a new Python list with the squared value of each element in a given list.
Write a python program that creates and prints a range of numbers.
Create a web scraper in Python that loads a website page and extracts a particular string of text.
Design an algorithm in Python for finding and printing all prime numbers between 1 and a given number.
